h4.p: [21] tathāgataṃ ^a^T1.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ jetavane vasantaṃ, apucchi vedehamunī nataṅgo.
[22] ``sabbaññubuddhā kira nāma honti, bhavanti te hetubhi kehi vīra''..
[22] ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā {bhummaṭṭhā (sī0 syā0)}, manasā sabbamāhariṃ..
[21] ``ye ca etarahi atthi, buddhā loke anuttarā.
[22] atīte ^a^T1.0004^ea^ vattamānā ca, bhavanaṃ sabbe samāhariṃ..
[22] atīte vattamāne ca, bhavanaṃ sabbe samāhariṃ..
[21] ``kapparukkhā bahū atthi, ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
[22] madhurā sakkharā ceva, telā ca madhuphāṇitā..
[22] aññe dhammāni desenti, aññe kīḷanti iddhiyā..
[22] aññamaññañca ^a^T1.0005^ea^ pucchitvā {pucchanti (sī0 syā0)}, aññoññaṃ byākaronti te..
[21] ``bheriyo sabbā vajjantu, vīṇā sabbā rasantu {ravantu (sī0 syā0)} tā.
[21] ``narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, sabbe devā upentu te.
[21] ``yaṃ kiñci kusalaṃ kammaṃ, kattabbaṃ kiriyaṃ mama.
[22] kāyena vācā manasā, tidase sukataṃ kataṃ..
[21] ``ye sattā saññino atthi, ye ca sattā asaññino.
[22] kataṃ puññaphalaṃ mayhaṃ, sabbe bhāgī bhavantu te..
[22] ye ca tattha {tasmiṃ (sī0 ka0)} na jānanti, devā gantvā nivedayuṃ..
[22] manuññaṃ bhojanaṃ sabbaṃ {sabbe (syā0)}, labhantu mama cetasā..
[22] aññaṃ gatiṃ na jānāmi, manasā patthanāphalaṃ..
[22] vividhāni ca vatthāni, nabhā {nabhasā (syā0)} khippaṃ upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, dibbā bhakkhā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, ratanā sabbe upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, sabbe gandhā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ {yattha (syā0), yaññaṃ (ka0)} hatthaṃ pasāremi, sabbe yānā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, sabbe mālā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, alaṅkārā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, sabbā kaññā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, madhusakkharā upenti maṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ hatthaṃ pasāremi, sabbe khajjā upenti maṃ..
[22] sabbe maṃ anuvattantu, yāva brahmanivesanaṃ {sabbeva sumanā hontu, sabbe maṃ anuvattare (sī0 syā0)}..
[22] etthantare janā sabbe, suṇantu madhuraṃ giraṃ..
[22] yettha pacchimakā sattā, sotāpannā bhavantu te..
[21] ``lābhālābhe sukhe dukkhe, sammāne cāvamānane {sammāne ca vimānane (ka0) sammānane vimānane (syā0)}.
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā attano buddhacariyaṃ sambhāvayamāno buddhāpadāniyaṃ {buddhacariyaṃ (sī0) buddhacaritaṃ (syā0)} nāma dhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[22] `paccekabuddhā kira nāma honti, bhavanti te hetubhi kehi vīra' {dhīra (sī0) dhīrā (syā0)}..
[21] ```sabbamhi lokamhi mamaṃ ṭhapetvā, paccekabuddhehi samova natthi.
[22] tesaṃ imaṃ vaṇṇapadesamattaṃ, vakkhāmahaṃ sādhu mahāmunīnaṃ..
[21] ```sayameva ^a^T1.0011^ea^ buddhānaṃ mahāisīnaṃ, sādhūni vākyāni madhūva {madhuṃva (sī0)} khuddaṃ.
[22] anuttaraṃ bhesajaṃ patthayantā, suṇātha sabbesu pasannacittā..
[22] ādīnavo yañca virāgavatthuṃ, yathā ca bodhiṃ anupāpuṇiṃsu..
[22] hitvā papañce jitaphanditāni {vidiya phanditāni (sī0) jitabandhitāni (ka0)}, tatheva bodhiṃ anupāpuṇiṃsu..
[21] ```sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ.
[22] mettena cittena hitānukampī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ.
[22] na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.
[22] vaṃse kaḷīrova asajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya.
[22] viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```āmantanā ^a^M1.0010^ea^ hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ca {vāse (sī0 syā0) suttanipātepi ``ca``kāro natthi} ṭhāne gamane cārikāya.
[22] anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```khiḍḍā ^a^T1.0013^ea^ ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu pemaṃ vipulañca hoti.
[22] parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ.
[22] abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā..
[21] ```no ^a^T1.0014^ea^ ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ.
[22] rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo..
[21] ```addhā ^a^M1.0011^ea^ pasaṃsāma sahāyasampadaṃ, seṭṭhā samā sevitabbā sahāyā.
[22] ete aladdhā anavajjabhojī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] saṅghaṭṭamānāni duve bhujasmiṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```evaṃ dutīyena sahā mamassa, vācābhilāpo abhisajjanā vā.
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```kāmā ^a^P1.0010^ea^ hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
[22] ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```ītī ^a^T1.0015^ea^ ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca sallañca bhayañca metaṃ.
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```sītañca uṇhañca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vātātape ḍaṃsasarīsape {ḍaṃsasiriṃsape (sī0 syā0)} ca.
[22] yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃ araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] nirāsayo {nirāsāso (ka0)} sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] aññāya ^a^P1.0011^ea^ atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavāni.
[22] hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```saṅgo ^a^T1.0017^ea^ ^a^M1.0013^ea^ eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamevettha bhiyyo.
[22] gaḷo {gāho (sī0) kaṇḍo (syā0) gāḷho (ka0)} eso iti ñatvā matimā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] anissito chejja sinehadosaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] padumaṃva toyena alimpamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī.
[22] sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle.
[22] sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ```bhajanti ^a^M1.0015^ea^ ^a^P1.0013^ea^ sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā.
[22] ye sāvakattaṃ na vajanti dhīrā, bhavanti paccekajinā sayambhū..
[22] dīpā parattha idha vijjalantā, paccekabuddhā satataṃ hitāme..
[22] sutvā tathā ye na karonti bālā, caranti dukkhesu punappunaṃ te..
[22] sutvā tathā ye paṭipattiyuttā, bhavanti te saccadasā sapaññā'..
[21] ``paccekabuddhehi ^a^P1.0014^ea^ jinehi bhāsitā, kathā {gāthā (sī0 syā0)} uḷārā abhinikkhamitvā.
[21] ``kumbhīlā makarā cettha, susumārā {suṃsumārā (sī0 syā0 )} ca kacchapā.
[21] ``pāṭhīnā pāvusā macchā, balajā {vajalā (sī0 syā0) jalajā (pī0)} muñjarohitā.
[22] vaggaḷā {vaggulā (sī0) vagguḷā (syā0) maggurā (theragāthā)} papatāyantā, sobhayanti {papatāyanti, sobhayantā (ka0)} mamassamaṃ..
[22] aṅkolā bimbijālā {bimbajālā (ka0)} ca, pupphitā mama assame..
[22] aññe opupphā padumā, pupphitā taḷāke tadā..
[22] saṃgulā maggurā {maṅgurā (sī0 ka0)} ceva, vasanti taḷāke tadā..
[22] oguhā {ogāhā (syā0)} ajagarā ca, vasanti taḷāke tadā..
[22] dindibhā suvapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] pampakā jīvaṃjīvā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] mahākāḷā ca sakuṇā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[21] ``pasadā ca varāhā ca, camarā gaṇḍakā bahū {vakā bheraṇḍakā bahū (sī0 syā0)}.
[22] rohiccā sukapotā {suttapotā (syā0)} ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] cetā ca luddakā ceva, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[21] ``kosambā {kosumbhā (sī0 syā0)} saḷalā nimbā {saḷalā nīpā (sī0 syā0) panasā ambā (?)}, sāduphalasamāyutā.
[22] kolā bhallātakā billā, phalāni dhārayanti te..
[22] jīvakā sutakā ceva, bahukā mama assame..
[22] sukate assame ramme, viharāmi ahaṃ tadā..
[22] asaṃsaṭṭhā ca te dhīrā, mama sissā durāsadā..
[22] vītināmenti te rattiṃ, mama sissā durāsadā..
[22] mohanīye na muyhanti, mama sissā durāsadā..
[22] pathaviṃ {paṭhaviṃ (sī0 syā0)} te pakampenti, sārambhena durāsadā..
[21] ``purato pesenti khāriṃ, pacchato ca vajanti te.
[22] anattukkaṃsakā sabbe, na te vambhenti kassaci..
[22] kumbhaṇḍā dānavā garuḷā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] upasaṅkamma sabbeva {sabbe te (syā0)}, sirasā vandare mamaṃ..
[22] vasāmi assame tattha, jhāyī jhānarato ahaṃ..
[21] ``rattindivaṃ na jānāmi, arati me na vijjati.
[22] sake sisse ovadanto, bhiyyo hāsaṃ labhāmahaṃ..
[22] buddho nu kho na vā buddho, handa passāmi cakkhumaṃ..
[22] taṃ ñāṇaṃ kittayissāmi, suṇātha mama bhāsato..
[21] ```tuvaṃ ^a^T1.0030^ea^ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ.
[22] parāyaṇo {parāyano (syā0 ka0)} patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo..
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave..
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā dharetave..
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave..
[21] ``tāva accuggato neru, āyato vitthato ca so.
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave..
[22] ye keci udake pāṇā, antojālīkatā siyuṃ..
[21] ```ko ^a^T1.0032^ea^ ^a^P1.0022^ea^ nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno.
[22] na hi buddhā ahetūhi, sitaṃ pātukaronti te'..
[21] ```hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī.
[22] padesarajjaṃ vipulaṃ, gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyaṃ {asaṅkhayaṃ (syā0 ka0) evamuparipi}..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] paññāya pāramiṃ gantvā, tappayissati pāṇine {pāṇino (sī0 syā0)}..
[22] yassāhaṃ kāraṃ {yassādhikāraṃ (syā0)} katvāna, sabbattha pāramiṃ gato..
[21] ``aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha.
[22] vicinaṃ titthiye sabbe, esāhaṃ saṃsariṃ bhave..
[22] vicineyya vanaṃ {dhanaṃ (syā0 ka0)} sabbaṃ, byādhito parimuttiyā..
[22] ye keci buddhimā sattā, sujjhanti jinasāsane..
[22] asaṅkhataṃ gavesanto, kutitthe {kutitthaṃ (sī0 syā0)} sañcariṃ ahaṃ..
[22] na tattha sāraṃ vindeyya, sārena rittako hi so..
[22] brāhmaṇo sañcayo {sañjayo (sī0 syā0 pī0)} nāma, tassa mūle vasāmahaṃ..
[22] so me puṭṭho kathessati, paṭipucchāmahaṃ tadā..
[22] `kathaṃ gottosi tvaṃ vīra, kassa sissosi mārisa'..
[22] buddhassa sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ, sādhu me kathayassu bho'..
[21] ``so me puṭṭho kathī sabbaṃ, gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ padaṃ.
[21] ```ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha.
[22] tesañca yo nirodho, evaṃ vādī mahāsamaṇo'..
[22] so me attho anuppatto, kālo me nappamajjituṃ..
[22] dantova dantadamatho {dantovuttamadamatho (sī0) dantova danta damathe (syā0)}, upasantosi brāhmaṇa..
[22] tvampi taṃ adhigacchesi {adhigacchāhi (sī0), adhigacchehi (syā0), adhigatosi (?)}, gacchāma buddhasantikaṃ'..
[22] hatthena hatthaṃ gaṇhitvā, upagamma {upāgami (sī0), upāgamma (syā0)} tavantikaṃ..
[22] paññāya sadiso natthi, tava puttassa cakkhuma..
[21] ``suvinītā ca te sissā, parisā ca susikkhitā.
[22] uttame damathe dantā, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] āsīsakā {āsiṃsakā (sī0 syā0)} uttamatthaṃ, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] anāgāmī ca arahā, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] sāvakā te bahū sabbe, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] paññāya pāramiṃ pattā, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] sāsane te patiṭṭhāya, labhanti amataṃ phalaṃ..
[22] gaṅgā ca yamunā ceva, sarabhū ca atho mahī..
[22] ete sabbe atikkamma, jalasi sabbadā tuvaṃ..
[22] sabbā velaṃva phusanti {sabbāva velaṃ phusanti (sī0), sabbā velaṃ paphussanti (syā0)}, sañcuṇṇā vikiranti tā..
[22] dhammaṃ vāditukāmā te, nātivattanti taṃ muniṃ..
[22] na so limpati toyena, parisuddho hi kesarī..
[22] nātikkamanti taṃ māsaṃ, samayo pupphanāya so..
[22] tevijjā chaḷabhiññā ca, iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatā..
[22] tathā hi jātimā eso, pasū tāseti sabbadā..
[22] kākā senāva vibbhantā, migaraññā yathā migā..
[21] ``na hevaṃ tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammaṃ desesi pāṇinaṃ.
[22] ekaṃ pañhaṃ kathentova, vimatiṃ chindasi {chindi (syā0 ka0)} pāṇinaṃ..
[22] parimetuṃ na sakkeyyuṃ {na kappeyyuṃ (syā0), na pappeyyuṃ (ka0)}, appameyyo tathāgato..
[21] ``sace ^a^T1.0043^ea^ hi koci devo vā, manusso vā susikkhito.
[21] ``aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha.
[22] sukhitto saravegova, kilese jhāpayī mama {jhāpayiṃ mama (syā0), jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (ka0)}..
[21] ``yo koci manujo bhāraṃ, dhāreyya matthake sadā.
[22] bhārena dukkhito assa, bhārehi bharito tathā..
[21] ``oropito ca me bhāro, bhavā ugghāṭitā mayā.
[22] ahaṃ aggomhi paññāya, sadiso me na vijjati..
[22] kathesi sāsanaṃ mayhaṃ, nirodho sayanaṃ mama..
[22] lokanāthaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sadiso me na vijjati..
[22] yaṃ saddhāsaṅgahitaṃ {saddhāya saṅgahitaṃ (sī0), saddāsaṅgahitaṃ (syā0)} cittaṃ, sadā sabrahmacārīsu..
[21] ``yadi rūpinī bhaveyya, paññā me vasumatīpi {vasumatī (sī0 ka0) vasupatīnaṃ (syā0)} na sameyya.
[22] appassuto anādaro {anācāro (sabbattha) theragā0 987 passitabbā}, sameto ahu katthaci..
[22] appicchā hotha santuṭṭhā, jhāyī jhānaratā sadā..
[22] so me ācariyo dhīro, assaji nāma sāvako..
[21] ``yo me ācariyo āsi, assaji nāma sāvako.
[03] kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ, bhavā sabbe samūhatā.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ {imā dve gāthāro syāmapotthake na santi}..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sāriputto thero imā gāthāyo
[21] ``vajjamānesu ^a^M1.0035^ea^ tūresu, devā tūrāni {turiyesu, devā turiyāni (sī0 syā0)} vajjayuṃ.
[22] obhāsento disā sabbā, bhavanaṃ me upāgami..
[21] ```yo so {yaṃ so (ka0)} saṅghaṃ apūjesi, buddhañca lokanāyakaṃ.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena {nāmena (sī0)}, satthā loke bhavissati..
[21] ``asmimānaṃ na passāmi, māno mayhaṃ na vijjati.
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``sādhūti te paṭissutvā, bhiyyo hāsaṃ janiṃsu me.
[22] tepi jotanti ābhāya, samantā caturo disā..
[22] aññamaññaṃ paghaṭṭenti, ākiṇṇaṃ hoti laṅkataṃ {taṃ tadā (sī0), satatā (syā0), saṅkaraṃ (?)}..
[21] ``tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, puna devattanaṃ gato {punapi devataṅgato (ka0)}..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] divā rattiñca passāmi, samantā yojanaṃ tadā..
[22] tassa dīpo mayā dinno, vippasannena cetasā..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā anuruddho thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
